sentences.en: A canker - root stopped in that big tree.
sentences.cn: 一只仓庚鸟落在那棵大树上.

sentences.en: According to him, I was the canker in their midst.
sentences.cn: 按照他说的, 我是他们中的害群之马.

sentences.en: And loathsome canker lives in sweetest bud.
sentences.cn: 可恶的毛虫把香的嫩蕊盘据.

sentences.en: Cankerous marked by or infected with canker; ulcerous.
sentences.cn: 具有溃疡特征的或感染上溃汤的; 溃烂的.

sentences.en: Caution: Don't use it when skin has cut, canker, whelk grouting and eczema.
sentences.cn: 注意事项: 皮肤有伤口, 溃烂, 青春痘灌浆,湿疹,等情况下不可以使用.

sentences.en: Diet and canker sores. What food allergies or reactions may cause canker sores?
sentences.cn: 饮食和口腔溃疡. 哪些食物将因为口腔过敏或有反应而引起口腔溃疡?

sentences.en: Fatigue, stress or allergies can increase the likelihood of a canker sore.
sentences.cn: 疲劳, 压力或过敏能增加口腔溃疡发作的可能性.

sentences.en: For canker vice the sweetest buds doth love.
sentences.cn: 因为恶蛆最爱那甜蜜的嫩蕊.

sentences.en: His dog has a canker in its ear.
sentences.cn: 他的狗的耳朵上有一处溃疡.

sentences.en: I have a small canker blister in my mouth.
the canker of violence in modern society
sentences.cn: 现代社会的祸患——暴力行为

sentences.en: The pathogenic fungi of pear canker disease is a new variety.
sentences.cn: 梨树腐烂病病原菌为一新变种.

sentences.en: The worm the canker, and the grief.
This unnatural birth, this canker, this blight.
sentences.cn: 这不自然的降生, 如同溃烂病, 如同枯萎症.

sentences.en: Which like a canker in the fragrant rose.
sentences.cn: 恰像馥郁的玫瑰花心的毛虫.

words.tran_cn: 溃疡的；腐蚀的；使害溃疡的
[植保]溃疡病；口疮；腐败的原由，弊害

trans.tran_cn: （植物的）溃疡，（动物）耳溃疡，腐败的影响，腐蚀因素
trans.tran_en: A canker or canker sore is a small sore in the mouth or on the lips
